name: unspayed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unspayed female animal has not had its ovaries (= the parts that produce eggs) removed: Ovarian tumours are occasionally seen in unspayed female dogs and cats. Opposite
spayedCompare
unaltered US
uncastrated
unneutered
More examplesFewer examplesUnspayed female rabbits often get ovarian cancer.Charging higher fees for unspayed and unneutered pets would help cover the city's costs in dealing with stray animals.I volunteer for my local animal shelter and have seen the condition these unspayed and unneutered rabbits arrive in.Unneutered male dogs sometimes get into fights and run away from home when they catch scent of a unspayed female on heat.
